stochastic_function: lambda field_choice, exam_performance: {1:0.8,0:0.2,-1:0.0} if field_choice=='science' and exam_performance=='excellent' else {1:0.5,0:0.4,-1:0.1} if field_choice=='science' and exam_performance=='good' else {1:0.3,0:0.5,-1:0.2} if field_choice=='science' and exam_performance=='average' else {1:0.6,0:0.3,-1:0.1} if field_choice=='arts' and exam_performance=='excellent' else {1:0.4,0:0.4,-1:0.2} if field_choice=='arts' and exam_performance=='good' else {1:0.2,0:0.5,-1:0.3}
lambda job_prospects: {1:0.8,0:0.2,-1:0.0} if job_prospects == 1 else ({1:0.4,0:0.5,-1:0.1} if job_prospects == 0 else {1:0.1,0:0.4,-1:0.5})
